artist: Painter: After Benvenuto Tisi; Engraver: Michelangelo Vignocchi; Designer: Antonie Boldini
description: Madonna seated on a pedestal with child at her side; two saints satnding on each side; head of lion lower right between pedestal and saint holding book

Michelangelo Vignocchi in./ MADONNA DEL PILASTRO/ a merito esimia del G umo Sig./ fortnnato Malucelli/ vero conoscitore e proteggitore amantissimo di Belle Arti/ M. title: Madonna del Pilastro
